books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Greg Iles
books.description: The journalist Marshall McEwan returns to his hometown, which is shaken by two deaths and an economy on the brink.
books.name: CEMETERY ROAD

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: After tragedy strikes, a child TV star loses her memory and ability to speak.
books.name: SILENT NIGHT

books.author: by Steve Berry
books.description: The 14th book in the Cotton Malone series. The former Justice Department operative tangles with a rogue cardinal and an ancient sect of knights.
books.name: THE MALTA EXCHANGE

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A fictional oral history charting the rise and fall of a ’70s rock ’n’ roll band.
books.name: DAISY JONES & THE SIX

books.author: by A.J. Finn
books.description: A recluse who drinks heavily and takes prescription drugs may have witnessed a crime across from her Harlem townhouse.
books.name: THE WOMAN IN THE WINDOW

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Tara Conklin
books.description: A family crisis tests the bonds and ideals of a renowned poet and her siblings.
books.name: THE LAST ROMANTICS

books.author: by James Patterson and Max DiLallo
books.description: Caleb Rooney, a police detective and celebrity food truck chef, must clear his name of murder allegations.
books.name: THE CHEF

books.author: by Pam Jenoff
books.description: Grace Healey investigates the fates of 12 women who were sent to occupied Europe to help the resistance during World War II.
books.name: THE LOST GIRLS OF PARIS

books.author: by Donna Leon
books.description: The 28th novel in the Commissario Guido Brunetti series. The Italian detective uncovers the secrets of a deceased family friend.
books.name: UNTO US A SON IS GIVEN

books.author: by Lisa See
books.description: The friendship over many decades of two female divers from the Korean Island of Jeju is pushed to a breaking point.
books.name: THE ISLAND OF SEA WOMEN

books.author: by Anne Bishop
books.description: Dangers threaten the resettlement of a ghost town by humans and creatures known as Others.
books.name: WILD COUNTRY

books.author: by Kate Quinn
books.description: A British journalist and a Russian female bomber pilot go after a Nazi war criminal.
books.name: THE HUNTRESS
